detail_desc: Cropped top in a patterned weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a V-neck with a tie detail at the front, and a smocked back.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves and a kangaroo pocket. Lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a high waist, gathers in the sides, gentle draping at the front and medium coverage at the back.
Ankle-length chinos in a soft cotton weave with a regular waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and fake back pockets with a button. Tapered legs with creases.
Fitted, long-sleeved top in soft ribbed jersey.
5-pocket, high-waisted, ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details. Slim legs with raw-edge hems.
Blouse in a soft viscose weave with beads and embroidery at the top, a collar and buttons down the front. Long flounced sleeves with narrow elastication and a decorative tie at the cuffs.
Knee-length shirt dress in a viscose crêpe weave with a collar, button placket, short dolman sleeves and slits in the sides.
Baby Exclusive. Skirt in an organic cotton weave with smocking and elastication at the waist. Lined.
Sleeveless blouse woven in a cotton blend with decorative scalloped trims. Small collar and buttons down the front.
Baby Exclusive. Shorts in an organic cotton double weave with an elasticated waist, straps that cross at the back with concealed, adjustable fasteners, and elasticated hems.
Short-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and ties at the hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a text motif on the front, dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Scarf in an airy weave with fringes along the sides.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight organic cotton jersey.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringes on the short sides. Size approx. 68x180 cm.
Rugby shirt in soft organic cotton jersey with a ribbed collar, button placket and long sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs.

Knee-length dress in matt satin with a unique nursing feature, lace yoke and a drawstring at the waist. The design includes a double layer at the top to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
Earrings in the shape of wavy hoops. Diameter 3 cm.
Off-the-shoulder top in soft jersey made from a viscose blend with narrow shoulder straps and short sleeves. Flounce at the top and smocking at the hem.
Long-sleeved all-in-one pyjamas in soft, printed organic cotton jersey with press-stud fastenings.
Espadrilles in a textured knit with a braided jute trim around the soles, an elastic strap over the foot and a loop at the back. Imitation cork insoles and rubber soles.
Chinos in slightly stretchy cotton twill with a regular waist and zip fly. Side pockets, flap back pockets with a button, and gently tapered legs.
Calf-length skirt in an airy viscose weave with a high waist and buttons down the front. Unlined.
Metal hair clips decorated with pearly plastic beads. Length 6 cm.
Cotton jersey boxer briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Shirt in soft, washed cotton denim with a collar, buttons down the front and open chest pocket. Yoke at the back, flounces on the shoulders and long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs.
Blouse in a cotton weave with pleats at the top and down the sleeves and a visible zip at the back. Short raglan sleeves with wide elastication and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool with hole-knit sections at the front and down the sleeves. Dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
V-neck blouse in a crêpe weave with butterfly sleeves and covered buttons down the front.
Short cycling shorts in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Baby Exclusive. Leggings in a soft, rib-knit organic cotton blend with covered elastication at the waist and turn-ups at the hems.
Microfibre thong briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.
Running tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a brushed thermal inside. Regular waist with a concealed drawstring, an open pocket on one leg, and a zip at the hems. Reflective details.
Short A-line skirt.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton and recycled polyester blend with a soft brushed inside. Covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Long-sleeved bodysuit, a pair of trousers and accessory in soft organic cotton jersey. Bodysuit with press-studs at the crotch. Trousers with wide foldover ribbing at the waist.

V-neck blouse in a softly draping weave with a stand-up collar and decorative gathers around the front and back of the neck. Long sleeves with close-fitting, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Wide headband in soft, rib-knit cashmere with a decorative knot at the front.
Patterned straw hat with a grosgrain band. Lined. Width of brim approx. 3.5 cm.

Short dress in a crinkled weave with a round neckline and opening with a covered button at the back of the neck. Short raglan sleeves with a flounced trim, a seam at the waist and a seam below with a gathered, flared skirt. Unlined.
Sleeveless playsuit in a viscose weave with elastication and a flounce at the top, an elasticated seam at the waist and side pockets.
Vest top in airy linen jersey. Deep V-neck at the back with a knot detail.
Long-sleeved blouse in a patterned weave with a slightly wider neckline, buttoned cuffs and gently rounded hem.
Long cardigan in a rib-knit cotton blend with low dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and patch front pockets.
Double-layered hat in soft jersey.
Knitted jacket with a stand-up collar, zip down the front, long raglan sleeves and front pockets. Soft, thermal fleece inside.
Dress in soft, organic cotton jersey with flutter sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist with decorative gathers.
T-shirt in soft jersey made from a viscose and cotton blend with an embroidered motif around the neckline and short frill trims around the sleeves.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front, a yoke at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Hipster briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Jumper in a soft fine knit with a wide neckline a the front, V-neck at the back, wide horizontal ties at the back of the neck, and lace trims at the cuffs and hem.
Trousers in an airy viscose weave with elastication and a decorative, tasselled drawstring at the waist. Side pockets and tapered legs with covered elastication at the hems.
Slip-on trainers in mesh with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Thin metal chain necklaces in different designs, three with coin-shaped pendants. Adjustable length between 38-46 cm and 48-56 cm.
Straight-style top in a soft, fine knit with a wide neckline, dropped shoulders and short, flounced sleeves.
Boxer briefs in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Sleeveless dress in a patterned weave with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Elasticated seam at the waist and an asymmetric, flounced hem. Unlined.
Shirt in soft cotton flannel with a collar, buttons down the front and a double-layered yoke with a seam at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a curved hem.
Soft fleece jacket designed to be worn as a thermal mid layer with a stand-up collar and zip down the front. Unlined.

Oversized zip-through hoodie in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Lined, drawstring hood, a zip down the front and front pockets. Long, wide raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The polyester content of the hoodie is recycled.

Shirt in narrow-wale cotton corduroy with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Long, pleated skirt in a softly draping crêpe weave with a high waist and a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastening in one side. Lined.
Long-sleeved jumper in fine-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Small bag in imitation leather with a zip at the top and an adjustable waist strap with a plastic fastener. Size 5x12.5x19 cm.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Jumper in a soft fine knit containing some wool with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Pyjamas with a long-sleeved shirt and pair of bottoms in soft satin. Shirt with a V-neck, collar and buttons down the front. Bottoms with covered elastication at the waist and wide, straight legs.
Smartphone case in plastic. Fits iPhone 6/6s/7.
Short, A-line skirt with a zip at the back and flounce at the hem.
Fitted top in airy, stretch fabric with a round neckline and long sleeves.
Flared skirt in several layers of glittery tulle with a wide elastic waistband. Lined.
Lace cardigan in a relaxed fit with long dolman sleeves. No fasteners.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed jersey.
Fitted polo-neck top in soft modal jersey with long sleeves.
Imitation suede cap with an adjustable fastener at the back. Mesh lining.
Straight-cut, short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar and classic front. Yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back, and an open chest pocket.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a deep V-neck, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Shirt in premium cotton poplin with a turn-down collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
